name: Smartwool Hike Ultra Light Sulawesi Crew Socks - Women's
categories: Hike Ultra Light Sulawesi Crew Socks
description: Super thin socks for close-fitting footwear. The flat-knit toe seam keeps your toes comfortable and the arch brace prevents bunching.Made of soft merino wool and synthetic blend.Arch brace holds sock securely in place.Flat-knit toe seam doesn't cause hotspots or chafing.
